title.en: A Prayer to Lungtok Tenpé Nyima

text.en: Namo! All-knowing teacher, dramatic expression of magical illusion;
text.en-trans: namo künkhyen lama gyutrul rolwé gar

text.en: Splendor of the teachings, sole protector of beings in these final five-hundred years;1
text.en-trans: ngabgyé drowé gön chik tenpé pal

text.en: Master of the teachings of the Great Secret, foremost guru;
text.en-trans: sang chen tenpé dakpo lama jé

text.en: Sun of the Teachings, Tenpé Nyima,2at your feet I humbly pray!
text.en-trans: tenpé nyimé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Through the secret path of luminous Great Perfection,
In one life, you reached the primordial expanse of reality's exhaustion.3
text.en-trans: tsé chik chö zé dömé ying su shek

text.en: Your face and that of the primordial protector4are one and the same—
text.en-trans: dömé gön dang zhal mi nyipa yi

text.en: Sun of the Teachings, Tenpé Nyima, at your feet I humbly pray!
text.en-trans: tenpé nyimé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Manifestation of the great paṇḍita Vimalamitra, protector of beings;
Splendid torch elucidating the Supreme Vehicle;
text.en-trans: ngön nang tek chok salwé drönmé ché

text.en: You whose mighty waves of compassion have never been matched—
text.en-trans: tukjé lab chen zhen dang tsungmé pé

text.en: Sun of the Teachings, Tenpé Nyima, at your feet I humbly pray!
text.en-trans: tenpé nyimé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Rinpoche, I beg you! Through the magnificent energy of your enlightened intent,
text.en-trans: solwa deb so gongpé tsal chen gyi

text.en: Please grace me, your child, with the transmission of blessings.
text.en-trans: jin gyü bu la tsol chik rinpoche

text.en: Bless me5to see my own true face in the view of the effortless natural condition;6
text.en-trans: tsolmé neluk tawé rang ngo tong

text.en: Bless me that deviations from non-grasping meditation resolve in basic space;
text.en-trans: dzinmé gompa golsa ying su chö

text.en: Bless me that the stumbling blocks to conduct with no fixations fall away in their natural place;7
text.en-trans: zhenmé chöpé gek trang rang sar zhi

text.en: And bless me to reach the primordial outlook!8
